name: Discount Legends
description:
It's Black Friday and your niece wants that new PS150. Or your roommate wants to get a fridge because your current one sucks. Or you just have a really bad case of FOMO.  Well here at Discount Legends, shop till you drop against other players  to see who can get the most savings! With Challonge and Photon integration, there is both tournament and multiplayer functionality.

Visit: https://challonge.com/DiscountLegends to register for leaderboard


MAX PLAYERS: 6 per room. DIRECTIONS: 
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to Move
  • Mouse to Rotate
  • Right Click to Attack
  • Left Click to Collect Items
